channel.title: NYS:CMG on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in NYS:CMG on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: Will Open Stores in South Korea, Singapore: Chipotle CEO
item.description: Chipotle Mexican Grill Inc. is venturing into Asia for the first time, with plans to open locations in South Korea and Singapore in 2026. Chief Executive Officer Scott Boatwright tells Romaine Bostick
